subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Omar Minaya, the Mets’ general manager, acknowledged Wednesday that he would be willing to part with some of the organization’s young talent if the Mets could acquire a potential ace in return.
snippet: Omar Minaya, the Mets’ general manager, acknowledged Wednesday that he would be willing to part with some of the organization’s young talent if the Mets could acquire a potential ace in return.
